title: Service disruption on East West Line

title_translations.ms: Gangguan perkhidmatan di Laluan Timur Barat

updates.text: [EWL] Train svcs have resumed btwn #JooKoon and #BoonLay. Free bus and bus shuttle services have ceased.

[EWL] Trains svcs have resumed btwn #JooKoon and #BoonLay. Free bus 
& bus shuttle svcs at these stations will continue until further notice
Trains svcs have resumed btwn #JooKoon and #BoonLay. Expect an additional 10 mins of travelling time.
[EWL]Due to traction power fault, there is no train service between #JooKoon and #BoonLay in both directions.
